elements.name: Users use these steps to log in to the site.
TC01: The visitor should be able to access the 'Loan Plans' page by clicking on Plans from the Home menu title

steps.name: The visitor enters the site with the given "Url"
Click on the Plans link in the menu header
When going to the Plans link, it is verified that the Loan Plans page is accessed
Close the page

elements.name: Users use these steps to log in to the site.
TC02:  The visitor should be able to see the 'Loan Plans' link under the Important Link heading
elements.description: in the Footer section of the Homepage and go to the relevant page when clicking on the link

steps.name: The visitor enters the site with the given "Url"
Go to the end of the homepage
Click on the Loan Plans link under the Important Link heading and confirm that you are on the Loan Plans page
Close the page

elements.name: Users use these steps to log in to the site.
TC03: Loan Plan Cards should be displayed under the Basic Loan heading on the Loan Plans Page,
elements.description: and the Apply Now buttons under the cards should be visible and active.

steps.name: The visitor enters the site with the given "Url"
Click on the Plans link in the menu header
Select Basic Loan and see Loan Plan Cards under the Basic Loan heading
Click on the Apply Now button under one of the plans and verify that it works
Close the page

elements.name: Users use these steps to log in to the site.
TC04: When you click on the Home \ Loan Plans links on the Loan Plans Page, you can go to the relevant pages.

steps.name: The visitor enters the site with the given "Url"
Click on the Plans link in the menu header
On the Loan Plans page, click on the Home link from the Home - Loan Plans options and go to the Home page
Close the page

name: US07: I would like to have a page where I, as a visitor, can access and select Loan Plans

elements.name: Users use these steps to log in to the site.
TC01: The user should be able to view and edit their profile information from the user dashboard page
elements.description: after logging into the site with their user information.

steps.name: The visitor enters the site with the given "Url"
Click the Login button and go to the user login page
The user logs in to the user dashboard page with "userNameSuphi" and "password"
Click on the Profile link to go to the page where profile information can be edited
Close the page

elements.name: Users use these steps to log in to the site.
TC02: The user should be able to see and edit card information on the Profile Settings page.

steps.name: The visitor enters the site with the given "Url"
Click the Login button and go to the user login page
The user logs in to the user dashboard page with "userNameSuphi" and "password"
Click on the Profile link to go to the page where profile information can be edited
User name, e-mail address, phone number, country information should be visible
Close the page

elements.name: Users use these steps to log in to the site.
TC03: Information in the Profile Card section should be editable in Profile Settings.

steps.name: The visitor enters the site with the given "Url"
Click the Login button and go to the user login page
The user logs in to the user dashboard page with "userNameSuphi" and "password"
Click on the Profile link to go to the page where profile information can be edited
Firstname and lastname are edited
Close the page

elements.name: Users use these steps to log in to the site.
TC04: The user should be able to select and upload new files from the image section of the profile settings.

steps.name: The visitor enters the site with the given "Url"
Click the Login button and go to the user login page
The user logs in to the user dashboard page with "userNameSuphi" and "password"
Click on the Profile link to go to the page where profile information can be edited
Click on Choose File button in Image section
The new file is selected and uploaded
Close the page

elements.name: Users use these steps to log in to the site.
TC05: In the Zip Code section in the profile settings section, characters other than digits should not be entered.

steps.name: The visitor enters the site with the given "Url"
Click the Login button and go to the user login page
The user logs in to the user dashboard page with "userNameSuphi" and "password"
Click on the Profile link to go to the page where profile information can be edited
Non-digit characters are entered in the zip code section
Enter digit characters in the Zip code section and save the changes by clicking the submit button
Close the page

elements.name: Users use these steps to log in to the site.
TC06: The user can make the necessary changes in the profile settings section and save these changes.

steps.name: The visitor enters the site with the given "Url"
Click the Login button and go to the user login page
The user logs in to the user dashboard page with "userNameSuphi" and "password"
Click on the Profile link to go to the page where profile information can be edited
The user makes the necessary changes in the profile settings section and saves the changes by clicking submit
Profile updated successfully appears when the changes are saved
Close the page

name: US14: As a registered user, I want to be able to access and update my profile information.

elements.name: Users use these steps to log in to the site.
TC01: After logging in to the admin dashboard, the admin icon should appear in the upper right corner.

steps.name: The visitor enters the admin site with the given "adminUrl"
The admin logs in to the admin dashboard page with "adminNameSuphi" and "passwordAdmin"
Click on the admin icon in the upper right corner of the admin dashboard page
Close the page

elements.name: Users use these steps to log in to the site.
TC02: When clicking on the admin icon, profile, password, logout links should appear.

steps.name: The visitor enters the admin site with the given "adminUrl"
The admin logs in to the admin dashboard page with "adminNameSuphi" and "passwordAdmin"
Click on the admin icon in the upper right corner of the admin dashboard page
The visibility of Admin, Profile, Password, Logout links is verified
Close the page

elements.name: Users use these steps to log in to the site.
TC03: Clicking on the profile link should take you to the Profile Information page and

steps.name: The visitor enters the admin site with the given "adminUrl"
The admin logs in to the admin dashboard page with "adminNameSuphi" and "passwordAdmin"
Click on the admin icon in the upper right corner of the admin dashboard page
Click on the profile link
Name, email, image information is updated and saved
It is confirmed that the changes made have been saved successfully by the text Profile updated successfully in the upper right corner
Close the page

elements.name: Users use these steps to log in to the site.
TC04: Clicking on the password link should take you to the password setting page and
elements.description: you should be able to update the password.

steps.name: The visitor enters the admin site with the given "adminUrl"
The admin logs in to the admin dashboard page with "adminNameSuphi" and "passwordAdmin"
Click on the admin icon in the upper right corner of the admin dashboard page
Click on the password link and go to the password setting page
In the Change password section, used Password, New Password and Confirm Password information must be entered
It is confirmed that the changes made have been saved successfully by the text Password changed successfully in the upper right corner
Close the page

elements.name: Users use these steps to log in to the site.
TC05: When the Logout link is clicked, you must successfully leave the page.

steps.name: The visitor enters the admin site with the given "adminUrl"
The admin logs in to the admin dashboard page with "adminNameSuphi" and "passwordAdmin"
Click on the admin icon in the upper right corner of the admin dashboard page
Click on the profile link
Click on the admin icon in the upper right corner of the admin dashboard page
Click on the logout link
It is verified that the admin page is exited
Close the page

name: US34: As an administrator, I want to be able to access and update my profile information.

elements.name: Users use these steps to log in to the site.
TC01: The 'Active Users' link should appear and be active under the 'Manage Users' link
elements.description: in the Nawbar on the Dashboard page.

steps.name: The visitor enters the admin site with the given "adminUrl"
The admin logs in to the admin dashboard page with "adminNameSuphi" and "passwordAdmin"
Click on the Manage Users link
Click on Active Users link under Manage Users link and go to Active Users page
Close the page

elements.name: Users use these steps to log in to the site.
TC02: When the 'Active Users' link is clicked, the 'Active Users List' and list titles should be displayed.

steps.name: The visitor enters the admin site with the given "adminUrl"
The admin logs in to the admin dashboard page with "adminNameSuphi" and "passwordAdmin"
Click on the Manage Users link
Click on Active Users link under Manage Users link and go to Active Users page
User, Email-Phone, Country, Joined At, Balance, Action information of Active Users are displayed
Close the page

elements.name: Users use these steps to log in to the site.
TC03: To access information about any user selected from the list, the 'Details' button must be visible and active.
elements.description: when clicked, it should redirect to the 'User Detail - Username' page.

steps.name: The visitor enters the admin site with the given "adminUrl"
The admin logs in to the admin dashboard page with "adminNameSuphi" and "passwordAdmin"
Click on the Manage Users link
Click on Active Users link under Manage Users link and go to Active Users page
User, Email-Phone, Country, Joined At, Balance, Action information of Active Users are displayed
Click on the Details link under the Action information of an Active User
Go to User Details page
Close the page

elements.name: Users use these steps to log in to the site.
TC04: The selected user's current profile information should be directed to the editing screen.
elements.description:
Basic information such as 'name, surname, e-mail, phone' should be editable.
                  Other private information about the user (if any) should be displayed and updated on the editing screen.
                  The validity of the updated information should be checked. For example, it should be checked whether
                  the email address is in the correct format. Required fields cannot be left blank.

steps.name: The visitor enters the admin site with the given "adminUrl"
The admin logs in to the admin dashboard page with "adminNameSuphi" and "passwordAdmin"
Click on the Manage Users link
Click on Active Users link under Manage Users link and go to Active Users page
User, Email-Phone, Country, Joined At, Balance, Action information of Active Users are displayed
Click on the Details link under the Action information of an Active User
Go to User Details page
The name and surname information under the heading Information of is reorganized and saved
The email address under the Information of heading is rearranged and saved in the correct format (there must be an "@" sign in the email address)
City information under the Information of heading is reorganized and saved
The State information under the Information of heading is reorganized and saved
Zip code information under the Information of heading is rearranged and saved
Close the page

elements.name: Users use these steps to log in to the site.
TC05: When the changes are approved, the user profile information in the system must be updated.
elements.description: The user should be shown a notification that the changes were successfully saved.

steps.name: The visitor enters the admin site with the given "adminUrl"
The admin logs in to the admin dashboard page with "adminNameSuphi" and "passwordAdmin"
Click on the Manage Users link
Click on Active Users link under Manage Users link and go to Active Users page
User, Email-Phone, Country, Joined At, Balance, Action information of Active Users are displayed
Click on the Details link under the Action information of an Active User
Go to User Details page
The information under the Information of heading is rearranged and saved by clicking Submit button
Changes are confirmed by the 'User details updated successfully' notification in the upper right corner of the page
Close the page

elements.name: Users use these steps to log in to the site.
TC06: When an unexpected error occurs in the system, a clear error message should be displayed to the user.
elements.description:
In case of incorrect entries (invalid e-mail, missing mandatory fields, etc.), the user should be informed
                  with appropriate error messages.

steps.name: The visitor enters the admin site with the given "adminUrl"
The admin logs in to the admin dashboard page with "adminNameSuphi" and "passwordAdmin"
Click on the Manage Users link
Click on Active Users link under Manage Users link and go to Active Users page
User, Email-Phone, Country, Joined At, Balance, Action information of Active Users are displayed
Click on the Details link under the Action information of an Active User
Go to User Details page
An attempt is made to enter missing - incorrect address information to the "e_mail" address
Please add an "@" sign to the email address. The "@" is missing in the "e_mail" address.' incorrect input notification is displayed
Close the page

name: US45: As an administrator, I want to be able to edit the profile information of a user I choose.
